org.apache.river.test.share

Class TestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.share.TestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddRenewRemoveTest, BatchRenewTest, ExpiredLeaseTest, GetLeasesTest, IdenticalAdminIteratorTest, IfExistsDontBlockSelfTest, InterruptTest, LeaseExpirationTest, LeaseGrantTestBase, LeaseGrantTestBase, LookupTestBase, MailboxTestBase, MatchTestCore, MutatingContentsTest, ReadReadTakeTest, ReadTakeAbortTest, ReadTakeCommitTest, RemoveExactlyOneTest, RenewalFailureTest, RenewAtTest, SimpleAdminTest, StableContentsTest, ThrowRuntimeException, TransactionTestBase, TxnManagerTest, TxnMgrTestBase

    public abstract class TestBase
extends QATestEnvironment
    Base class for spaces QA tests. Provides convenience functions for logging failure, starting/finding and cleaning up the services under test. Also sets up a command line parser.

    Tests provide an implementation of runTest() that performs the appropriate tests, using specifyServices() to indicate what services they need for the test. Test failure should be indicated by calling fail() (or its close relative, setupFailure()) Passing can be indicated by calling pass() or by returning from runTest() normally. Tests should not invoke Status.exit() directly.

    If a test needs to parse command line arguments it should override parse() and use the CmdLine command line parser provided in line.

    If a test has to perform any post test cleanup it should override cleanup() Command line arguments

    -external jini-url
    The test will find the necessary services though the designated lookup service. Normally the test will start any necessary services with the exception of an activation demon.
    -scrub
    Can be used with -external. The test will attempt to put the services in a "clean" state before running the test. Note this is currently implemented only for JavaSpaces.
    -administrable classname
    Particular service to spawn/look for if the test needs and Administrable service.
    -space classname
    Particular type of JavaSpace to spawn/look for if the test needs a JavaSpace.
    -waitAtEnd
    Wait for user input before exiting or killing services under test
    -cleanupWait long
    The number of milliseconds to wait after cleaning up (i.e. destroying the services) at the end of a test run. Defaults to 0.
    Note: the "Sub" command line options (ie -administrableSub, -spaceSub have slightly different constraints depending on whether -external is being used or not. In stand alone mode the test needs a concrete class that it can spawn. In external mode these option only need be specified so the test can uniquely identify the service to test. Thus if the only service the test needed was a JavaSpace, and the designated lookup service had only two registrants, the lookup service itself and a JavaSpace, no command line argument would be necessary. If the test needed an Administrable the -administrableSub command line argument would have to be used to let the test know if it should be testing the lookup service or the JavaSpace.

    • Method Detail

      • construct

        public Test construct(QAConfig config)
               throws Exception
        Description copied from class: QATestEnvironment
        This method is called by the MasterTest immediately before the run method is called. Override this method to implement test specific construct code. This method:
        • saves a reference to config
        • starts the class server identified by the serviceName "qaClassServer" if the config value named org.apache.river.qa.harness.runkitserver is true (the default)
        • starts the class server identified by the serviceName "jiniClassServer" if the config value named org.apache.river.qa.harness.runjiniserver is true (the default)

        In the majority of cases this method will be overridden. The first action taken by the method should be a call to super.construct(sysConfig).

        Specified by:
        construct in interface TestEnvironment
        Overrides:
        construct in class QATestEnvironment
        Parameters:
        config - the test properties
        Returns:
        Test to run.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any failure occurs during construct

      • shutdown

        protected void shutdown(int index)
                 throws Exception
        Attempts to shutdown the designated service. Throws UnsupportedOperationException if it does not know how to shutdown the designated service. Sleep for the time suggested by the service or by what is indicated by the restart_wait command line arg, which ever is greater.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • shutdown

        protected void shutdown(int index,
                        long wait)
                 throws Exception
        Attempts to shutdown the designated service. Throws UnsupportedOperationException if it does not know how to shutdown the designated service. Sleep for time indicated by the the second argument. If the second argument is less than the time suggested by the service throws an IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        Exception

      • addLease

        public void addLease(net.jini.core.lease.Lease lease,
                     boolean unknownOk)
        TestBase keeps a list of leases that should be canceled in the cleanup phase, this method adds a lease to that list. Note the leases on this list are not canceled if TestBase thinks the these resouces are going to be cleaned up someother way.
        Parameters:
        lease - The Lease to be canceled
        unknownOk - If true UnknownLeaseException will be ignored when this lease is cancled.

      • addOutriggerLease

        public void addOutriggerLease(net.jini.core.lease.Lease lease,
                              boolean unknownOk)
                       throws TestException
        TestBase keeps a list of leases that should be canceled in the cleanup phase, this method adds a lease to that list. Before adding the lease, it is prepared using the ProxyPreparer named test.outriggerLeasePreparer. Note the leases on this list are not canceled if TestBase thinks the these resouces are going to be cleaned up someother way.
        Parameters:
        lease - The Lease to be canceled
        unknownOk - If true UnknownLeaseException will be ignored when this lease is cancled.
        Throws:
        TestException
